title: Deserts located around 30° due to sinking dry air

content.prompt: Most deserts on Earth are located near the 30° north and 30° south latitudes because humidity is lower at 30°. The best explanation for the lower humidity is that

choices.label: warm air rises at 90° latitude, cools, and sinks at 30°
cool air rises at 30° latitude, warms, and sinks at the equator
warm air rises at the equator, cools, and sinks at 30° latitude
trade winds transfer moisture away from 30° latitude
rain-shadow effects are most pronounced at 30° latitude

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
